name: Empathy
description: Emotional sensitivity and capacity to understand or care for others.

name: Assertiveness
description: Confidence in expressing needs, taking initiative, and standing ground.

name: Curiosity
description: Inclination to explore, ask questions, and seek out new knowledge or experiences.

name: Discipline
description: Self-control and ability to persist, follow plans, and resist impulsive behavior.

name: Sociability
description: Desire for social interaction, stimulation, and company of others.

name: Loyalty
description: Devotion and faithfulness to people, causes, or beliefs.

name: Risk Tolerance
description: Comfort with danger, uncertainty, or high-stakes scenarios.

name: Deviance
description: Willingness to challenge authority, break rules, or defy norms.

name: Mood Stability
description: Consistency and predictability of emotional reactions.

name: Ambition
description: Drive to achieve goals, status, or personal excellence.
